# Introduction

The accountR package provides useful tools for accounting and financial reporting. The tools allow users to convert data frames that include values of multiple currencies automatically into one user-defined currency at a specific reporting date. Additionally, it provides functions to automatically generate a Trade Receivables Aged Analysis report which can be used to calculate the Allowance for Doubtful Accounts or other tasks of the Accounts Receivable Management, such as monitoring of payment collections.

# Setup

You must install the accountR library from CRAN or Github:

```{r}
#Installation from CRAN
#install.packages("accountR")

#or installation from Github
#library(devtools)
#install_github("mschuermann/accountR")
```

And then load it to use it in your session:

```{r}
library(accountR)
```
